entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023
